Female Sales Representative Job at Home Bargains Nigeria Limited




        
    

        
        Home Bargains Nigeria Limited is a gift and decor store situated in Abuja, Nigeria.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Female Sales Representative

Job Location:  Wuse Zone 1, Abuja (FCT)
Employment Type: Full-time

Job Description


	We are looking for a dynamic and customer-focused Sales Representative to join our retail team. If you have a passion for sales and enjoy working in a fast-paced environment, we want to hear from you!


Responsibilities
     

        


     (adsbygoogle = window.adsbygoogle || []).push({});
    
    




	Assist customers with purchases and product inquiries
	Maintain store cleanliness and product displays
	Process sales transactions accurately
	Achieve individual and team sales targets.


Requirements


	Interested candidates should possess a minimum of an OND qualification in a related field with 2 - 3 years of work experience.
	Previous retail sales experience is essential
	Excellent communication and interpersonal skills
	Strong attention to detail and ability to multitask
	A team player with a positive attitude.


Work Schedule:


	4 days per week,9:00 AM - 6:00 PM
	2 compulsory Sundaysper month.


Salary
N90,000 - N100,000 per month.

Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV and Cover letter to: ad.homebargains@gmail.com using the Job Position as the subject of the mail.

Note: Anaptitude test will be conducted as part of the recruitment process.

Account Executive Job at Kerildbert Holdings Limited




        
    

        
        Kerildbert Holdings Limited is a leading 3rd Party Logistics Company in the provision of Shipments, Clearing & Freight Forwarding, Customs Brokerage Removals and Procurement Services to firms in the Country.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Account Executive

Job Location: Lagos
Employment type: Full time

Role Summary
     

        


     (adsbygoogle = window.adsbygoogle || []).push({});
    
    




	Reporting directly to the Finance Manager, the Accounts Executive will support the execution of daily accounting tasks, preparation of reports, and reconciliation of financial records.
	The ideal candidate is grounded in core accounting principles, tech-savvy with financial software, and possesses strong analytical skills to work in a dynamic environment.


Key Responsibilities
Daily Bookkeeping & Transactions:


	Post sales invoices, purchase bills, journals, and ledger entries
	Prepare and dispatch invoices to clients


Reconciliation & Reporting:


	Conduct bank and general ledger reconciliations
	Assist with monthly and quarterly financial close
	Support management accounts and reporting preparation


Accounts Receivable & Payable:


	Monitor customer and vendor accounts for timely collections and payments


Statutory Compliance & Tax:


	Assist in filing VAT, PAYE, and pension schedules
	Support FIRS and LIRS tax audit preparation


Process Support & Liaison:


	Update fixed asset registers and track depreciation
	Communicate with vendors, banks, and internal teams
	Participate in financial process improvement projects


Qualifications & Experience


	B.Sc. / HND in Accounting or Finance
	2 – 4 years of hands-on experience in a core accounting role
	Proficiency in accounting software (Sage, QuickBooks) and Microsoft Excel
	ICAN Skill Level or higher is an added advantage
	Strong organizational, analytical, and interpersonal skills
	Ability to manage confidential information with integrity.


Salary
N250,000 - N350,000 Monthly.

Why Join Us?


	Structured and Performance-Oriented Environment
	Exposure to Cross-Functional Financial Operations
	Career Growth and Professional Development Support
	EPIC Work Culture – Excellence, Professionalism, Innovation, Customer-Centricity.

  "description": "Virginrose Resorts is designed for the discerning Traveler, Tourist, Corporate organizations, Government agencies and International delegates that desire excellent service, homey environment, state of the art facilities, perfect Spa treatment, good old wine and delicious meal (continental and local).

Our Chef with his team is in waiting, ready all day to offer you and your guests any choice of delightful Nigerian and Continental dish from Breakfast through to Dinner and accompanied by an excellent selection of global wine. The need to exceed your expectations, is the aim of our restaurant and bar, as they are focused and unique in Business - Launch; Buffet or A&rsquo;lacarte for your traditional and international cuisine.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Receptionist

Job Location:&nbsp;Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time

Job Description


	Our hotel,&nbsp;Virginrose Resorts, is looking for a professional Receptionist with a minimum of one year experience to join our already thriving team.


Responsibilities


	Greeting and welcoming guests upon arrival.
	Performing all check-in and check-out tasks.
	Answering inquiries from guests about hotel services, facilities, and hours of operation.
	Managing online and phone reservations.
	Informing customers about payment methods and verifying their credit card data.
	Responding to clients complaints in a timely and professional manner.
	Liaising with our housekeeping staff to ensure all rooms are clean and tidy to accommodate guests needs.
	Upselling additional facilities and services, when appropriate.
	Registering guests collecting necessary information (like contact details and exact date of their stay).
	Ensuring all guest information is accurate and up to date.
	Providing information about the hotel, available rooms, rates and amenities.
	Maintaining updated records of bookings and payments.
	Maintaining a clean and organized front desk area.


Requirements


	Candidates should possess a Degree in Hotel Management or other relevant fields.
	Work experience as a Hotel Front Desk Agent, Receptionist or similar role is a plus.
	Experience with hotel reservations software, like Biodux is a plus.
	Customer service attitude.
	Excellent communication and organizational skills.


Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should send a copy of their CV to:&nbsp;hrvirginroseresorts@gmail.com&nbsp;using the Job Position as the subject of the email.",

	Our hotel, Virginrose Resorts, is looking for a professional Receptionist with a minimum of one year experience to join our already thriving team.
